topic.title: Solution Bundle
topic.shortdesc: In setting up deployments, Dell has created the solution for the person or team that wants to use OpenStack in an environment that starts to duplicate production.

ul.li: Develop tools to use with OpenStack for day-to-day usage and management
Have Administrators learn how to manage OpenStack.
Develop applications that require actual hardware as the base
Determine and investigate what networking issues will be seen in a production system
